short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Minecraft Block Ninja is a fun and simple game by slashing flying fruit, remember to avoid bombs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Minecraft Block Ninja is a fun and simple game by slashing flying fruit, remember to avoid bombs. You will win if you cut a lot of fruit and money will fly up. Every time you hit a bomb, you will have a second chance. If you cut again, you will lose
